page.title: 14ST. MICHAEL'S MOUNT CUSTOMS
page.content:
On important occasions the castle on St. Michael's Mount is{floodlit.}This was done during the summer of 1977 to celebrate the Silver Jubilee year of Queen Elizabeth 2nd.
There are many Cornish stories concerning{giants.}The story of Jack the Giant Killer is so well known that it appears in many childrens' books of fairy stories. There is a possibility that the Mount was once the stronghold of a robber baron or chief who made raids on Marazion and the surrounding countryside, and whose exploits have been exaggerated into the legends of the Giant of St. Michael's Mount.
These Domesday entries were compiled by the children of Gulval C.P. School, Penzance.
